data.persona: I live alone in a tent in the woods. I steal food from the townspeople and coal from the blacksmith. The village police can not find me to put me in jail.
data.description:
You are in the Bamboo hut.
Built of bamboo trunks and a bamboo leaf roof, this small hut has one window on each side and a short door, where those who enter must stoop down so they don't hit their heads. A dirt floor is covered with palm fronds gathered from the jungle; four small rocks are placed around the center of the room, forming a place for the occupants to sit. A small fire burns just outside of the hut, and a wooden spit is suspended over the fire. One of the support poles of the hut has a woven grass bag hanging from it. The bag contains a half-dozen coconuts, clearly gathered for consuming at a later time. A colorful lizard is sleeping in the sun in one of the windows.
There's some rocks, a knife, some small rocks, a small fire, a wooden spit, a table, a colorful lizard, some coconuts, and some half-dozen coconuts here.
A tribe chief is here.

You are carrying some meat and some coal, and wearing a cloak and a dark tunic.

            "desc": "Built of bamboo trunks and a bamboo leaf roof, this small hut has one window on each side and a short door, where those who enter must stoop down so they don't hit their heads. A dirt floor is covered with palm fronds gathered from the jungle; four small rocks are placed around the center of the room, forming a place for the occupants to sit. A small fire burns just outside of the hut, and a wooden spit is suspended over the fire. One of the support poles of the hut has a woven grass bag hanging from it. The bag contains a half-dozen coconuts, clearly gathered for consuming at a later time. A colorful lizard is sleeping in the sun in one of the windows.",
            "extra_desc": "The hut was built by a tribesman who is the last of his people. It is his only shelter from the elements. He is afraid that if there is another strong monsoon, the hut may not survive and he will lose his only shelter and be forced to head down-river into unknown territory.",
